title: SEM Configuration Schema (SCS)
description: Schema defining mandatory parameters for deterministic environment sealing (SFM must conform).

L3_RunID.description: Unique identifier for the L3 execution session.

DeterministicMandate.description: Must be true to enable SEM enforcement.

ResourceIsolationMatrix.description: Hard resource limits for CPU, Memory, I/O.

ExecutionTimeConstraintLock.description: Maximum execution duration allowed, in seconds (CTL-01).

ICM_ProvenanceHash.description: Expected SHA256 hash of the pre-validated Input Chain Manifest (ICM).
